content: for those little leftover balls of cotton yarn this dishcloth is a great way to use up cotton scraps with no ends to weave in suitable for all levels of knitters dishcloth measures 7 x 7 plus fringe size is easily adjusted by adding more stitches or row **instructions given for the 2 blue striped dishcloths in the same picture ** allow 120 for casting on and the first two row allow 65 for 2 row a little more than 1 gram for the body of the dishcloth allow 72-75 for the last row and bind off
